thread.title: 'Active shooter situation' reported at junior college in Downtown Louisville
thread.title_full: 'Active shooter situation' reported at junior college in Downtown Louisville

author: Brian in Mesa
title: 'Active shooter situation' reported at junior college in Downtown Louisville
text: 'Active shooter situation' reported at junior college in Downtown Louisville 'Active shooter situation' reported at junior college in Downtown Louisville MetroSafe confirms active shooter situation at Jefferson Community and Technical College in Downtown Louisville. Authorities have not disclosed any other information, but multiple units are on the scene. The school sent a text alert and email to students in regard to the situation. The text alert read: JEFFERSON TECH Violent Incident sent 3:39 PM Fri, Oct 9. -Use caution to evacuate safely or seek cover in locked room if possible.
